Sentencas: The unique location of Egypt makes it very promising for obtaining freshwater from the sea.
Titulo: Water desalination plant powered by solid oxide fuel cell technology in Egypt

Sentencas: After applying suitable desalination techniques integrated with solar radiation photovoltaics (PVs), freshwater can be easily produced.
Titulo: Water desalination plant powered by solid oxide fuel cell technology in Egypt

Sentencas: Integrated desalination, including solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs), PVs, and a reverse osmosis (RO) system is proposed in this work.
Titulo: Water desalination plant powered by solid oxide fuel cell technology in Egypt

Sentencas: To demonstrate the advantages and better improve the efficiency of the integrated system, a mathematical model was established for evaluation.
Titulo: Water desalination plant powered by solid oxide fuel cell technology in Egypt

Sentencas: In this work, the model was applied in two different locations with high intensity solar radiation (El-Zafrana and El-Arish).
Titulo: Water desalination plant powered by solid oxide fuel cell technology in Egypt

Sentencas: The RO system was applied and integrated with SOFC technology then simulated and modeled using MATLAB Simulink.
Titulo: Water desalination plant powered by solid oxide fuel cell technology in Egypt

Sentencas: Results demonstrate the ability to obtain 2000 t/d freshwater production capacity with consideration of SOFC devices.
Titulo: Water desalination plant powered by solid oxide fuel cell technology in Egypt

Sentencas: The expected annual income from this plant is 750,000 USD after its sixth year of construction.
Titulo: Water desalination plant powered by solid oxide fuel cell technology in Egypt

Sentencas: In addition, the desalination process is proposed for non-stop use, over an entire day, of the used seawater.
Titulo: Water desalination plant powered by solid oxide fuel cell technology in Egypt

Sentencas: The simulation results provided in this work will help further future commercialization of such a project.
Titulo: Water desalination plant powered by solid oxide fuel cell technology in Egypt
